properties.entry: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NICKNAME) VALUES (SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT MEMO_NO, MEMO_TITLE, CREATE_DT, MODIFY_DT FROM MEMO WHERE MEMO_TITLE LIKE ? ORDER BY MEMO_NO DESC
SELECT MEMO_NO, MEMO_TITLE, MEMO_CONTENT, CREATE_DT, MODIFY_DT, MEMBER_NO FROM MEMO WHERE MEMO_NO = ?
SELECT MEMO_NO, MEMO_TITLE, CREATE_DT FROM MEMO ORDER BY CREATE_DT DESC
